abstract: An investigation of a Medtronic bone treatment study found instances of research misconduct but failed to find proof that it contained falsified data.
snippet: An investigation of a Medtronic bone treatment study found instances of research misconduct but failed to find proof that it contained falsified data.
lead_paragraph: An academic panel investigating a former Army surgeon who performed a study of a Medtronic bone treatment study said in a report that it had found instances of research misconduct but failed to find proof that he had falsified data.

headline.main: Panel Finds Shortcomings in Bone Study
headline.print_headline: Panel Finds Shortcomings in Bone Study
